description: Number of reversible strings with n beads of 2 colors. If more than 1 bead, not palindromic.
comments: a(n) is also the number of induced subgraphs with odd number of edges in the path graph P(n) if n>0. - Alessandro Cosentino (cosenal(AT)gmail.com), Feb 06 2009A common recurrence of the bisections A020522 and A006516 means a(n+4) = 6a(n+2) - 8a(n), n>1. - _Yosu Yurramendi_, Aug 07 2008

formula: "BHK" (reversible, identity, unlabeled) transform of 2, 0, 0, 0...a(n) = 2^(n-1)-2^floor((n-1)/2), n > 1. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 11 2001g.f.: 2*x+x^2/((1-2*x)*(1-2*x^2)) - Mohammed Bouayoun (bouyao(AT)wanadoo.fr), Mar 25 2004a(n)=A005418(n+1)-A016116(n+2), n>1. - _Yosu Yurramendi_, Aug 07 2008a(n+1) = A077957(n) + 2*a(n), n>1. a(n+2) = A000079(n+1) + 2*a(n), n>1. - _Yosu Yurramendi_, Aug 10 2008First differences: a(n+1)-a(n) = A007179(n) = A156232(n+2)/4, n>1. - _Paul Curtz_, Nov 16 2009a(n) = 2*(a(n-1) bitwiseOR a(n-2)), n>3. - _Pierre Charland_, Dec 12 2010
